abstract: In key battlegrounds, the president's strategists intend to use abortion, gay rights, the environment and successes against Al Qaeda to counter economic attacks.
snippet: In key battlegrounds, the president's strategists intend to use abortion, gay rights, the environment and successes against Al Qaeda to counter economic attacks.

headline.main: Obama Campaign Borrows From Bush '04 Playbook
headline.print_headline: Obama Campaign Borrows From Bush ’04 Playbook
